mapper.select: Select * From (Select rownum rn, a.* From (select iDTL.*, i.itemName, sf.staffName, st.secName From Item i, itemDTL iDTL, staff sf, section st Where i.itemID = iDTL.itemID And iDTL.staffID = sf.staffID And i.sectionId = st.sectionId order by iDTL.itemDTLId desc ) a ) Where rn Between #{start} and #{end}

select iDTL.*, i.itemName, sf.staffName, st.secName, st.sectionId From Item i, itemDTL iDTL, staff sf, section st Where iDTL.itemDtlId = #{itemDtlId} And i.itemID = iDTL.itemID And iDTL.staffID = sf.staffID And i.sectionId = st.sectionId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ItemDTL VALUES ( ITEMDTLID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{yearMonth}, #{initialFinal}, #{itemId}, #{staffId}, #{colorName}, #{purchasePrice}, #{salesPrice}, #{quantity}, SYSDATE, #{status}, #{thumbnail}, #{detailImg}, #{colorImg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ItemDTL SET yearMonth = #{yearMonth}, initialFinal = #{initialFinal}, itemId = #{itemId}, staffId = #{staffId}, colorName = #{colorName}, purchasePrice = #{purchasePrice}, salesPrice = #{salesPrice}, quantity = #{quantity}, STATUS = #{status}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, detailImg = #{detailImg}, colorImg = #{colorImg} WHERE itemDtlId = #{itemDtlId}
